business.headline: The hidden catch in 40-year term insurance policies and how to choose betterBuying a 40-year term insurance policy is like paying rent for a house you'll never live in that long. It feels safe, but often it's money that could be better used elsewhere.

US Fed chair signals possible September rate cut, cites rising job market risksUS Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's comments open the door to a rate cut at the Fed's September 16-17 meeting, but also put heavy weight on jobs and inflation reports that will be received before then.

Planning Europe trip? Schengen visa hike may upset your trip budgetThe Schengen visa allows travellers to visit 29 European countries for up to 90 days within a 180-day period. Applicants must submit standard documents, including travel plans, insurance, and financial proof.

See rates from HDFC, ICICI, SBI and 3 othersMost lenders usually announce similar interest rates on one-year deposits, making it seem as if there isn't much of a difference in where you invest. This investor cut his Rs 10 lakh tax bill to 0. Here's howMany taxpayers assume that once the financial year ends, their chance to save tax is gone.and Ramesh was no exception. But instead of rushing, he used a little-known route that brought his tax bill down to nothing.

Real-money gaming ban rocks advertising, sports sponsorships: What's at stake?The rise of money-based platforms created billions in advertising spend, now facing a sudden halt. Credit score confusion: Is CIBIL transparent enough in deciding your financial fate?The credit score by CIBIL can decide whether someone gets a car loan, a home loan, or even a credit card. Yet, very few actually know how CIBIL works or who controls it.

ITR filing 2024–25: Comparing deductions under old and new tax regimeFiling your Income Tax Return for FY 2024–25? Before you decide on old or new tax regime, it's important to know how deductions differ. The right choice could help reduce your taxable income and overall tax burden.

entertainment.headline: Suniel Shetty, Sanjay Dutt to spark nostalgia on Great Indian Kapil Show. general news.headline: UP dowry death accused shot in leg as he tried to flee, snatched cop's gunGreater Noida police shot and injured Vipin, the prime accused in the brutal murder of his wife Nikki, after he attempted to escape custody on Saturday.

Jobless overnight, but families to feed: The human cost of India's gaming banThe ban on real-money online gaming is upending real lives. Thousands of professionals are desperately looking for jobs as their companies hit the dead end. The sector also sustained people earning from games of skills, like millions in India do from the stock market. This is the untold story of how the government's blanket ban on real money gaming platforms has hit lakhs of people.

India strengthens air shield with first test of multi-layered defence systemThe Integrated Air Defence Weapon System is a multi-layered air defence system comprising entirely indigenous Quick Reaction Surface-to-Air Missiles, Advanced Very Short Range Air Defence System missiles, and a high-power laser-based Directed Energy Weapon. These systems are designed to form the integrated air defence shield Sudarshan Chakra, announced by PM Modi on Independence Day.
